outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this preparatory assistance is to assist the Government of Guyana to prepare its CFC Terminal Phase Out Management Plan (TPMP) proposal for submission to the Executive Committee of the Multilateral Fund for the Implementation of the Montreal Protocol. Development of the TPMP will complement previous support given to assist the Government of Guyana to comply with the Montreal Protocol CFC reduction measures of 50% in 2005 and 85% in 2007.  Once approved, the TPMP will assist the Government of Guyana to address the 15% remaining consumption to achieve 100% phase out in 2010.

project_descr: TERMINAL PHASE OUT MANAGEMENT PLAN: INVESTMENT INTERVENTIONS & TECHNICIANS TRAINING
